translated: the characteristic of the realm of phenomena, the characteristic of union, the characteristic of separation, the characteristic of cause, the characteristic of condition, the characteristic of suffering, the characteristic of happiness,🔽the characteristic of establishment, the characteristic of birth, the characteristic of destruction, the characteristic of affliction, the characteristic of purification, the characteristic of nature, the characteristic of the relative,

original: don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bden pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rdzun pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid du nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bden pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rdzun pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid du nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: the characteristic of the ultimate, the characteristic of truth, the characteristic of falsity, the characteristic of transference, and the characteristic of engagement.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: the perfection of wisdom

original: mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba ste /
translated: is free from all characteristics.🔽It is not something that can be seen as ‘this is the perfection of wisdom,’

original: 'di ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhe'am /🔽'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhe'am /🔽'dis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhe'am /
analyzed: 'di ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhe'am / 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhe'am / 'dis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhe'am /
translated: or ‘this is the perfection of wisdom,’🔽or ‘by this is the perfection of wisdom,’

original: 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes de sus mthong bar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes de sus mthong bar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: or ‘this is the perfection of wisdom.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: chos gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i chos de kho bos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i chos de kho bos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see any phenomenon by which the perfection of wisdom could be taught.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /🔽chos gang nges par bstan par yang nye bar 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / chos gang nges par bstan par yang nye bar 'gro ba'am /
translated: the perfection of wisdom

original: nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: does not approach or go to any phenomenon that could be taught.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva @67b ti'i bu; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva @67b ti'i bu; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra, the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no //
translated: does not approach the demonstration of form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin /
translated: It does not approach the demonstration of feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no //
translated: It does not approach the demonstration of the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind.

original: khams rnams nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin; rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin /
analyzed: khams rnams nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin; rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin /
translated: It does not approach the demonstration of the constituents, or dependent origination.

original: rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no //
translated: It does not approach the demonstration of knowledge and liberation.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab nges par 'byed par 'gro ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par bstan par nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: gang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab nges par 'byed par 'gro ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par bstan par nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not taught in order to go forth to the supramundane wisdom that penetrates.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: chos gang nges par bstan par yang nye bar mi 'gro ba'i chos de ji ltar brjod cing nges par bstan par 'gyur /
analyzed: chos gang nges par bstan par yang nye bar mi 'gro ba'i chos de ji ltar brjod cing nges par bstan par 'gyur /
translated: How can a dharma that does not go forth to be taught be expressed and taught?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra!

original: gang dag chos rnams kyi tshul de ltar rab tu shes pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang dag chos rnams kyi tshul de ltar rab tu shes pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par rab tu shes so //
translated: Those who know the way of dharmas in this way know the teaching of the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra!

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom

original: chos gang bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos gang bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: does not abide in order to teach or to demonstrate any dharma.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra!

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du @68a *//
analyzed: gzugs bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du @68a *//
translated: Form is not present as a teaching or as a definite expression.

original: byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not present as a teaching or as a definite expression.

original: ming dang gzugs bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: Name and form are not present as a teaching or as a definite expression.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: Defilement and purification are not present as a teaching or as a definite expression.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: Dependent origination is not present as a teaching or as a definite expression.

original: phyin ci log rnams bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: phyin ci log rnams bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: The four errors are not present as a teaching or as a definite expression.

original: sems can gyi khams dang / bdag gi khams bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams dang / bdag gi khams bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: The realms of sentient beings and the realm of the self are not present as a teaching or as a definite expression.

original: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: the elements of earth, water, fire, and wind are not present as teachings or definitive meanings;

original: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: the realms of desire, form, and formlessness are not present as teachings or definitive meanings;

original: tshul khrims dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: moral discipline and immorality are not present as teachings or definitive meanings;

original: bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par g-yeng ba dang / shes rab dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par g-yeng ba dang / shes rab dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: patience and malice, diligence and laziness, concentration and distraction, wisdom and stupidity are not present as teachings or definitive meanings.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / tshad med pa dang / @68b dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar ba dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / tshad med pa dang / @68b dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar ba dang /
translated: the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, the meditative concentrations, the liberations,

original: ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: the meditative absorptions, the meditative stabilities, the clairvoyances, the teachings, and the definitive teachings are not present.

original: bden pa dang / lam dang / 'bras bu bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: bden pa dang / lam dang / 'bras bu bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: The teachings on the truths, the path, and the fruits, and the definitive teachings are not present.

original: nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: The teachings on the śrāvaka level, the pratyekabuddha level, and the bodhisattva levels, and the definitive teachings are not present.

original: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: He is not present as a teaching of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, or the bodhisattvas, or as a teaching of the definitive.

original: chos gang shes pa dang / mi shes pa dang / bstan pa dang / bstan du med par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: chos gang shes pa dang / mi shes pa dang / bstan pa dang / bstan du med par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /
translated: He is not present as a teaching of any phenomenon, whether it is known or unknown, or whether it is taught or not taught.

original: mi skye ba shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa bstan pa'am /
analyzed: mi skye ba shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa bstan pa'am /
translated: He is not present as a teaching of the knowledge of nonarising, the knowledge of exhaustion, or the knowledge of cessation.

original: bstan pa ma yin par nye bar gnas pa ma yin /🔽mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa'am /
analyzed: bstan pa ma yin par nye bar gnas pa ma yin / mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa'am /
translated: He is not present as a teaching or as not a teaching.🔽He is not present as a teaching of nirvāṇa.

original: bstan pa ma yin par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bstan pa ma yin par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: He is not present as a teaching or as not a teaching.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu 'di lta ste /🔽chos gang bstan pa'am /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu 'di lta ste / chos gang bstan pa'am /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra, it is like this:🔽He is not present as a teaching of any phenomenon,

original: bstan pa ma yin par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar bstan par bya /
analyzed: bstan pa ma yin par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar bstan par bya /
translated: or as not a teaching. How can he be taught through a conventional expression?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: whoever teaches the perfection of wisdom

original: chos gang bstan pa'am /
analyzed: chos gang bstan pa'am /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not taught as a dharma that is taught or not taught.🔽One who understands this non-teaching understands the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not taught as a dharma that is taught or not taught.🔽One who understands this non-teaching understands the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not taught as a dharma that is taught or not taught.

original: bstan pa ma yin par nye bar gnas pa ma yin par bstan pa 'di lta bu khong du chud pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes shing /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @69a *//
analyzed: bstan pa ma yin par nye bar gnas pa ma yin par bstan pa 'di lta bu khong du chud pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @69a *//
translated: One who understands this non-teaching understands the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not taught as a dharma that is taught or not taught.

original: pa bstan pa yang shes so //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: pa bstan pa yang shes so // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: One who understands this non-teaching understands the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not taught as a dharma that is taught or not taught.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: One who understands this non-teaching understands the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos gang la yang sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: chos gang la yang sbyor ba'am /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not taught as a dharma that is taught or not taught.🔽One who understands this non-teaching understands the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi sbyor bar nye bar gnas pa ma yin no; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: mi sbyor bar nye bar gnas pa ma yin no; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not taught as a dharma that is taught or not taught.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /🔽gzugs la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / gzugs la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
translated: One who understands this non-teaching understands the perfection of wisdom.

original: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
analyzed: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not taught as a dharma that is taught or not taught.🔽One who understands this non-teaching understands the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not taught as a dharma that is taught or not taught.🔽One who understands this non-teaching understands the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not taught as a dharma that is taught or not taught.🔽One who understands this non-teaching understands the perfection of wisdom.

original: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
analyzed: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not taught as a dharma that is taught or not taught.🔽One who understands this non-teaching understands the perfection of wisdom.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba kun tu sbyor pa yang mi byed /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba kun tu sbyor pa yang mi byed /
translated: He does not unite dependent origination,

original: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
analyzed: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
translated: nor does he not unite it.

original: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
translated: He does not unite the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm,

original: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
analyzed: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
translated: nor does he not unite them.

original: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
translated: He does not unite the earth element, the water element, the fire element, and the wind element,

original: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
analyzed: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
translated: nor does he not unite them.

original: sems can gyi khams dang / bdag gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha'i khams la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams dang / bdag gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha'i khams la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
translated: He does not unite the element of beings, the element of self, the element of phenomena, and the element of space,

original: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
analyzed: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
translated: nor does he not unite them.

original: tshul khrims dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par g-yeng ba dang / shes rab dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par g-yeng ba dang / shes rab dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
translated: He does not form attachments to morality and immorality, patience and malice, effort and laziness, meditation and distraction, wisdom and stupidity.

original: @69b kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
analyzed: @69b kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
translated: He does not form attachments to nonattachment.🔽He does not form attachments to the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of supernormal  ability, the faculties, the powers, the aspects of enlightenment, the branches of the path, the meditative concentrations,

original: rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
translated: the deliverances, the meditative absorptions, or the attainments.

original: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
analyzed: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
translated: He does not form attachments to nonattachment.

original: lam dang / lam gyi 'bras bu dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: lam dang / lam gyi 'bras bu dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
translated: He does not join with the path, the result of the path, suffering, origination, or cessation.

original: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
analyzed: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
translated: He does not join with non-joining.

original: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
translated: He does not join with the śrāvaka level, the pratyekabuddha level, or the bodhisattva level.

original: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
analyzed: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
translated: He does not join with non-joining.

original: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
translated: He does not join with the dharmas of the śrāvakas, the dharmas of the pratyekabuddhas, or the dharmas of the bodhisattvas.

original: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
analyzed: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
translated: He does not join with non-joining.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung bar shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung bar shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed /
translated: He does not join with the knowledge of the past, the future, and the present, or with the sameness of the three times.

original: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
analyzed: kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //
translated: He does not join with non-joining.

original: thogs pa med pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed; kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽'di lta ste /🔽chos gang la yang kun tu sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed; kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / 'di lta ste / chos gang la yang kun tu sbyor ba'am /
translated: He does not cause the knowledge of the nonarising of dharmas to be joined with or disjoined from the knowledge of nirvana.🔽He does not cause the knowledge of the nonarising of dharmas to be joined with or disjoined from the knowledge of the realm of totality.🔽He does not cause the knowledge of the nonarising of dharmas to be joined with or disjoined from the knowledge of the realm of reality.🔽He does not cause the knowledge of the nonarising of dharmas to be joined with or disjoined from the knowledge of the sphere of endless space.🔽He does not cause the knowledge of the nonarising of dharmas to be joined with or disjoined from the knowledge of the sphere of endless consciousness.🔽He does not cause the knowledge of the nonarising of dharmas to be joined with or disjoined from the knowledge of the sphere of nothingness.

original: kun tu sbyor ba ma yin par nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa de /🔽ji ltar @70a *//
analyzed: kun tu sbyor ba ma yin par nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa de / ji ltar @70a *//
translated: He does not cause the knowledge of the nonarising of dharmas to be joined with or disjoined from the knowledge of the sphere of neither perception nor nonperception.

original: bstan par bya /🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: bstan par bya / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: He does not cause the knowledge of the nonarising of dharmas to be joined with or disjoined from the knowledge of the cessation of perception and feeling.🔽He does not cause the knowledge of the nonarising of dharmas to be joined with or disjoined from the knowledge of the perfection of giving.

original: kho bo chos gang la spobs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis kho bo spobs par 'gyur ba dang / gang la kho bo spobs par 'gyur ba dang / gang la kho bos brtsams par spobs par 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /🔽kho bos dbang de mthong bas kho bos de skad smras so //
analyzed: kho bo chos gang la spobs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis kho bo spobs par 'gyur ba dang / gang la kho bo spobs par 'gyur ba dang / gang la kho bos brtsams par spobs par 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste / kho bos dbang de mthong bas kho bos de skad smras so //
translated: He does not cause the knowledge of the nonarising of dharmas to be joined with or disjoined from the knowledge of the perfection of morality.

original: rab 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ste /
translated: He does not cause the knowledge of the non

original: lnga pa'o //// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: lnga pa'o //// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Then the Lord said to the Bodhisattva, the great being, Suvikrāntavikrāmin:🔽“Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom

original: chos gang la yang mi spyod do //
analyzed: chos gang la yang mi spyod do //
translated: does not practice any dharma.🔽And why is that?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: all dharmas

original: phyin ci log las byung ba /
analyzed: phyin ci log las byung ba /
translated: arise from error,

original: bden pa ma yin pa /🔽med pa / log pa /
analyzed: bden pa ma yin pa / med pa / log pa /
translated: are not true,🔽nonexistent, false,

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa ste /

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

analyzed: de'i phyir gang chos 'ga' zhig la spyod na /

analyzed: de ni / phyin ci log la spyod pa'o //

analyzed: de ni / yang dag pa ma yin pa la spyod pa'o //

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni /🔽phyin ci log la spyod pas rab tu phye ba'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni / phyin ci log la spyod pas rab tu phye ba'am /

analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa spyod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin no // byang chub sems dpa' phyin ci log gam /

analyzed: yang dag @70b pa ma yin pa la spyod pa de ni /

analyzed: gang phyin ci log dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa la spyod pa gang yang med pas /

analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de la mi spyod do //

analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa / phyin ci log ces bya ba 'di ni /
translated: Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should train accordingly.

original: log par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis bzung ba ste /
analyzed: log par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis bzung ba ste /

analyzed: chos de ni /

analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du ma yin no //

analyzed: phyin ci log dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni /

analyzed: yang dag par smra ba ste /

analyzed: de'i phyir spyod pa med pa ni /

analyzed: 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o // 'di na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dag ni /

analyzed: so @71a *// so'i skye bo'i spyod pa bzlog pa'o //

analyzed: nyan thos kyi spyod pa bzlog pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa bzlog pa dang / spyod pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod do // rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: and they practice the bodhisattva conduct in order to turn away from the conduct of the hearers, turn away from the conduct of the solitary buddhas, and turn away from all conduct.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag go /

analyzed: 'dis sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag go / 'di ni / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag go /

analyzed: zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa de dag la yang mi spyod cing mngon par zhen pa med de /
translated: ” They do not engage with, and do not settle down on, any of those buddha qualities.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

analyzed: de ltar mi spyod do //

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ni /
translated: all of these

original: rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o //

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni /

original: rtog pa thams cad spangs pa yin pas /
analyzed: rtog pa thams cad spangs pa yin pas /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni /

analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang / mi rtog pa la mi spyod do //

analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

analyzed: rtog pa zhes bya ba de ni /

original: chos rnams la rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams la rnam par rtog pa'o //

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /

analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa yin pas /

analyzed: chos thams cad la brtag par mi nus so // de'i phyir gang chos la rtog pa de log par rtog pa'o //

analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa / chos ni / rtog pa'am /

analyzed: mi rtog pa ma yin no //

analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

analyzed: rtog pa zhes bya ba de ni /

analyzed: mtha' gcig go / mi rtog pa zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: mtha' gnyis @71b te; rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa / byang chub sems dpa' ni /

analyzed: gang mtha' dang / mtha' med pa la mi spyod pa des ni /

analyzed: dbus yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: rang kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rang kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

analyzed: dbus yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing dbus la spyod na ni /

analyzed: mtha' nyid la spyod do //

analyzed: nges par bstan pa gang yang med do //

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: dbus zhes bya ba de ni /
analyzed: dbus zhes bya ba de ni /
translated: the so-called middle🔽is a synonym for the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshig bla dvags so; ;rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshig bla dvags so; ;rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni /

original: chos gang dmigs pa dang / chos gang mthong ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos gang dmigs pa dang / chos gang mthong ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no //

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: nam chos gang la yang sgom par yang mi byed /
analyzed: nam chos gang la yang sgom par yang mi byed /
translated: when one does not cultivate or not cultivate any phenomenon,

original: mi sgom par yang mi byed pa de'i tshe lam gyi rgyun bcad ces bya'o //🔽de chos thams cad la sgom par yang mi byed /
analyzed: mi sgom par yang mi byed pa de'i tshe lam gyi rgyun bcad ces bya'o // de chos thams cad la sgom par yang mi byed /

original: mi sgom par yang mi byed pas /
analyzed: mi sgom par yang mi byed pas /

analyzed: sgom pa las yang dag par 'das nas chos mnyam pa nyid rnyed de /

analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid des lam gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung na /
translated: Since the perception of a path does not arise through that sameness of phenomena,

original: lam mthong bar lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: lam mthong bar lta ga la 'gyur /

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /🔽lam gyi rgyun bcad ces bya ba de ni /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa / lam gyi rgyun bcad ces bya ba de ni /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

analyzed: dge slong zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
translated: ‘the stream of the path has been cut’ is a term for a bhikṣu who is an arhat whose defilements have ceased.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: des bsgoms pa yang med cing bsgoms pa @72a *//

analyzed: med pa yang ma yin par lam bsgoms pa med pas /

analyzed: de'i phyir sgom pa med ces bya'o //

original: sgom pa med pa yang de la med pas /
analyzed: sgom pa med pa yang de la med pas /

original: de'i phyir sgom pa med ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgom pa med ces bya'o //

original: de sgom pa dang bral bas de'i phyir sgom pa med ces bya'o //
analyzed: de sgom pa dang bral bas de'i phyir sgom pa med ces bya'o //
translated: Because it is free from meditation, it is called ‘nonmeditation.’

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /🔽gal te sgom pa'am /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa / gal te sgom pa'am /

analyzed: sgom pa med pa zhig yod na ni /

analyzed: de dmigs par 'gyur te /

original: de sgom pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de sgom pa med par mi 'gyur ro //

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: sgom pa med pa zhes bya ba de /🔽sgom pa dang bral bas /
analyzed: sgom pa med pa zhes bya ba de / sgom pa dang bral bas /
translated: that which is called ‘nonmeditation’🔽is free from meditation,

original: sgom pa med pa ste /
analyzed: sgom pa med pa ste /

original: 'di dngos po dang bral bas /

analyzed: bral ba'o // bral ba gang zhe na /

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /

analyzed: der yang brjod na /

original: rnam par mi spyod do //
analyzed: rnam par mi spyod do //
translated: he does not disengage from it.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Subhūti,

original: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni /🔽tshor ba'o // 'di ni /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni / tshor ba'o // 'di ni /
translated: a bodhisattva who practices in this way🔽does not see ‘this is feeling,’

original: 'du shes so //
analyzed: 'du shes so //
translated: ‘this is perception,’

original: 'di ni / 'du byed rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ni / 'du byed rnams so //
translated: ‘these are compositional factors,’

original: 'di ni / rnam par shes pa'o //🔽zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'di ni / rnam par shes pa'o //🔽zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: ‘this is consciousness.’

original: 'dis rnam par shes pa zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'dis rnam par shes pa zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see anything that could be called consciousness.🔽

original: 'di'i rnam par shes pa zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: 'di'i rnam par shes pa zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see consciousness as ‘this,’🔽they do not see consciousness as ‘mine,’

original: 'di las rnam par shes pa zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di las rnam par shes pa zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: and they do not see consciousness as ‘that.’

original: de de ltar rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas rnam par shes pa mi 'deg /🔽mi 'jog / rnam par shes pa mi skyed /
analyzed: de de ltar rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas rnam par shes pa mi 'deg / mi 'jog / rnam par shes pa mi skyed /
translated: “In that way, they do not see consciousness, and so they do not grasp at consciousness,🔽they do not establish consciousness, they do not produce consciousness,

original: mi 'gog / rnam par shes pa la mi @80a *//🔽spyod; rnam par mi spyod do //
analyzed: mi 'gog / rnam par shes pa la mi @80a *// spyod; rnam par mi spyod do //
translated: and they do not cease consciousness.🔽They do not engage with consciousness,🔽and they do not disengage from consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa la mi spyod /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa la mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the reference point of consciousness,

original: rnam par mi spyod do //🔽rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rnam par mi spyod do // rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: and they do not disengage from it.

original: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: “Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom accordingly

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o //🔽rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o // rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: are said to practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.”

original: gzhan yang de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom accordingly

original: gzugs la 'das pa zhes mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs la 'das pa zhes mi spyod /
translated: do not engage with the notion that physical forms are past,

original: gzugs la ma 'ongs pa zhes mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs la ma 'ongs pa zhes mi spyod /
translated: One does not use the expression ‘past form,’

original: gzugs la da ltar byung ba zhes mi spyod do //
analyzed: gzugs la da ltar byung ba zhes mi spyod do //
translated: nor does one use the expression ‘present form.’🔽Similarly, one does not use the expressions ‘past feeling,’ ‘future feeling,’ or ‘present feeling’;🔽one does not use the expressions ‘past perception,’ ‘future perception,’ or ‘present perception’;🔽one does not use the expressions ‘past volitional formations,’ ‘future volitional formations,’ or ‘present volitional formations’;

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes mi spyod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes mi spyod do //
translated: one does not use the expressions ‘past consciousness,’ ‘future consciousness,’ or ‘present consciousness.’

original: gzugs la bdag ces mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs la bdag ces mi spyod /
translated: One does not use the expression ‘form is self.’

original: gzugs la bdag gi zhes mi spyod do //
analyzed: gzugs la bdag gi zhes mi spyod do //
translated: One does not use the expression ‘form is not self.’🔽Similarly, one does not use the expression ‘feeling is self,’🔽nor does one use the expression ‘feeling is not self’;🔽one does not use the expression ‘perception is self,’🔽nor does one use the expression ‘perception is not self’;

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag ces mi spyod /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag ces mi spyod /
translated: one does not use the expression ‘volitional formations are self,’🔽nor does one use the expression ‘volitional formations are not self’;🔽one does not use the expression ‘consciousness is self,’

original: rnam par shes pa la bdag gi zhes mi spyod do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la bdag gi zhes mi spyod do //
translated: nor does one use the expression ‘consciousness is not self.’

original: gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes mi spyod do //
analyzed: gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes mi spyod do //
translated: One does not use the expression ‘form is suffering.’🔽Similarly, one does not use the expression ‘feeling is suffering,’🔽nor does one use the expression ‘feeling is not suffering’;🔽one does not use the expression ‘perception is suffering,’🔽nor does one use the expression ‘perception is not suffering’;

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal zhes mi spyod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal zhes mi spyod do //
translated: one does not use the expression ‘volitional formations are suffering,’🔽nor does one use the expression ‘volitional formations are not suffering’;🔽one does not use the expression ‘consciousness is suffering,’🔽nor does one use the expression ‘consciousness is not suffering.’

original: gzugs la bdag gi dang / gzhan gyi zhes mi spyod do //
analyzed: gzugs la bdag gi dang / gzhan gyi zhes mi spyod do //
translated: One does not use the expression ‘form is mine.’

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag gi dang / gzhan gyi zhes mi spyod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag gi dang / gzhan gyi zhes mi spyod do //
translated: In the same way, he does not practice with regard to feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness, as belonging to self or other.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: the bodhisattva who practices in this way

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o //
translated: practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /
translated: Suvikrāntavikrāmin,

original: @80b gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: @80b gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: furthermore, the bodhisattva who practices the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs kyi kun 'byung ba la mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs kyi kun 'byung ba la mi spyod /
translated: does not practice with regard to the origin of form,

original: gzugs kyi 'gog pa la mi spyod /🔽gzugs la zab ces mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'gog pa la mi spyod / gzugs la zab ces mi spyod /
translated: does not practice with regard to the cessation of form,🔽does not practice with regard to form as profound,

original: gzugs la mi zab ces mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs la mi zab ces mi spyod /
translated: does not practice with regard to form as not profound,

original: gzugs la stong zhes mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs la stong zhes mi spyod /
translated: does not practice with regard to form as empty,
